name: SpikeWrap
description:
Jump higher and higher in the endless tower, as the walls close in around you. Of course, sometimes there are no walls.

Art: https://too-many-turtles.itch.io/

Music: https://maximannor.itch.io/

Code: https://setteduetto.itch.io/

If you like the game, please check out Flail Faster on Steam!
